title: Scully Helped us Reach a 99 Lighthouse Score for a B2C Platform
author: Ruslan Ponuzhdayev
seoDescription: We sped up the overall page load and increased the platform lighthouse score to 99-100. Also, connecting Google eCommerce Marketing helped us see several areas for improvement on the website and in mobile apps to streamline the user journey. Learn from our experience how you can achieve a boost in website performance and visibility for your project using Scully and Google Analytics. Also, I’m going to help you overcome possible difficulties with integrations since we’ve already been there :)
